name: pdbe_get_entry_summary
description: Get summary information for a PDB entry including title, authors, release date, and basic structure metadata.

pdb_id.description: PDB entry ID (e.g., '1A2B', '1CRN'). Will be converted to lowercase automatically.

name: pdbe_get_entry_quality
description: Get quality metrics and validation information for a PDB entry including resolution, R-free, Ramachandran statistics, and validation scores. Note: Quality endpoint may not be available for all PDB entries. If this returns 404, try pdbe_get_entry_summary which includes basic quality information.

pdb_id.description: PDB entry ID (e.g., '1A2B', '1CRN'). Will be converted to lowercase automatically.

data.description: Quality metrics and validation data (only present if status is 'success')

error.description: Error message (only present if status is 'error')

suggestion.description: Suggestion for alternative endpoint (only present if status is 'error')

name: pdbe_get_entry_publications
description: Get publication information associated with a PDB entry including authors, journal, DOI, and citation details.

pdb_id.description: PDB entry ID (e.g., '1A2B', '1CRN'). Will be converted to lowercase automatically.

name: pdbe_get_entry_assemblies
description: Get biological assembly information for a PDB entry including assembly IDs, symmetry operations, and assembly composition. Note: The assemblies endpoint may return 404 for some entries. This tool automatically falls back to extracting assembly information from the summary endpoint. If both methods fail, use pdbe_get_entry_summary for comprehensive structure information.

pdb_id.description: PDB entry ID (e.g., '1A2B', '1CRN'). Will be converted to lowercase automatically.

fallback_used.description: Whether fallback to summary endpoint was used (only present if fallback occurred)

note.description: Note about data source (only present if fallback was used)

name: pdbe_get_entry_secondary_structure
description: Get secondary structure information for a PDB entry including helix, sheet, and turn assignments.

pdb_id.description: PDB entry ID (e.g., '1A2B', '1CRN'). Will be converted to lowercase automatically.

count.description: Number of secondary structure entries returned (typically 1)

name: pdbe_get_entry_molecules
description: Get molecule information for a PDB entry including molecule type, entity ID, length, chains, mutations, molecular weight, and gene names. Use this to understand the composition and properties of molecules in the structure.

pdb_id.description: PDB entry ID (e.g., '1A2B', '1CRN'). Will be converted to lowercase automatically.

data.description: Molecule information organized by PDB ID, containing arrays of molecule objects with fields like molecule_type, entity_id, length, chains, mutations, weight, gene_name

count.description: Number of molecules returned (when data is a list)

name: pdbe_get_entry_related_publications
description: Get publications related to a PDB entry that appear without citation, including PubMed IDs, titles, journals, authors, and citation counts. This complements pdbe_get_entry_publications by showing additional related publications.

pdb_id.description: PDB entry ID (e.g., '1A2B', '1CRN'). Will be converted to lowercase automatically.

data.description: Related publications organized by PDB ID, containing articles with pubmed_id, title, journal, authors, citation counts

count.description: Number of top-level categories returned (typically 1 for this endpoint)

name: pdbe_get_entry_status
description: Get status information for a PDB entry including release date, status code, authors, experimental method, and whether the entry has been superseded or obsoleted. Use this to check the current status and availability of a PDB entry.

pdb_id.description: PDB entry ID (e.g., '1A2B', '1CRN'). Will be converted to lowercase automatically.

data.description: Entry status information organized by PDB ID, containing status_code, release_date, authors, experimental_method, superceded_by, obsoletes

name: pdbe_get_entry_experiment
description: Get experimental details for a PDB entry including experimental method, resolution, R-factors, completeness, refinement software, space group, and unit cell parameters. This provides detailed experimental metadata for structure determination.

pdb_id.description: PDB entry ID (e.g., '1A2B', '1CRN'). Will be converted to lowercase automatically.

data.description: Experimental details organized by PDB ID, containing experimental_method, resolution, r_factor, r_free, completeness, refinement_software, spacegroup, cell parameters

name: pdbe_get_entry_observed_residues_ratio
description: Get observed residues ratio for chains in a PDB entry, indicating what fraction of residues are observed in the structure. This helps assess structure completeness and quality. Returns information per chain including struct_asym_id, chain_id, number of residues, observed ratio, and partial ratio.

pdb_id.description: PDB entry ID (e.g., '1A2B', '1CRN'). Will be converted to lowercase automatically.

data.description: Observed residues ratio organized by PDB ID and entity ID, containing arrays with struct_asym_id, chain_id, number_residues, observed_ratio, partial_ratio

count.description: Number of entity groups returned (typically 1 or more)
